posts.author: HipRedux
posts.content:
Not exactly sure what the goal of this build is other than perhaps anti-DevCrit with the copious attention to fort saves.  A brief write-up would have helped a lot. At any rate, this is an attempt at a PvP build rather than focused on general PvM.  Anyway...

Please furnish full stats even though they may not seem pertinent to the main focus of the build.  In this case, I'll fill them in for you.

BAB 27
APR 4
AB (ranged): 28

If you want to supply feat-based specs, include full effects like this:

Expertise mode
Naked: AC - 29, AB - 40, Somatic Spell failure - 0
Full plate/tower: AC - 40, AB - 40, Somatic Spell Failure - 95% (w/o Still spells)

etc...  for any other buffing effects you feel are significant.

With all the skill dumping inherent in this build, please provide the obligatory skill allotment schedule, assuming you actually expect someone to test it out for you without duplicating your own efforts.  Please try to conform to this format in future builds to make it easier for others to digest your ideas and help it along.  Thanks, mate!

edit: btw, just a minor change I noticed... slide 2 skill ranks from UMD to Listen.  All scrolls still read without failure and detection slightly better.
